topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b875463687241cd0c1300#post_549b875463687241cd0c1300
Was a soldier. I did five years and got out because I don't like being in countries where people want to shoot me in the face, especially when I've become cynical about our reason for being in said pro shooting me in the face countries to begin with.

I'm the same way now, I literally can't watch most tv anymore because commercials just bug the fucking shit outta me.

On that note: "watch this.":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=80kDRoso_X8 There is something about it that elevates it beyond irritating to actively making me want to murder the planet.

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/549b943b63687279eda40300#post_549b943b63687279eda40300
Depends how it works. Alot of afterlifes sound like any thoughts that would make you be bored of it would get wiped away. If that was the case then I'd be okay. Not like I could tell the difference at that point.

If I'm fully depression/ boredom capable. Afterlif no sound too good then.
